altTitles.ja: たえピー・ハッピーシリーズ

description.en:
In the Taepi Happy series:

1. Shichigatsu Kakumei!!
Natsuki aims to become a star female professional wrestler in order to be found by her missing father. However, she is told by the organization to become a male professional wrestler...!?

2. Wagamama Baby
Manami is a middle school student who is busy with love and play. However, one day,        a suspenseful comedy about raising a 2-year-old child, Ikumi!!

3. Chichin Puipui
Ranran is the only daughter of a Chinese restaurant owner. Her noodles are the best in the world. Their restaurant is thriving thanks to the panda ramen, which is paired with her father's secret ancestral soup. One day, a panda suddenly falls from the sky and crashes into his father. His father gets injured and he ends up in the hospital for three months. Ranran is at a loss because there is no one left to make her special soup, but the panda suddenly starts speaking in human language. Pui Pui is a space panda who came from the planet Chichin and claims to be a ramen chef. He offers to make soup for his father, who is injured and unable to move.
